---
title: "Task 8: Estimating disease severity"
---

## Overview

This task focuses on estimating disease severity. You will learn how to calculate and interpret key severity metrics such as case fatality ratio and infection fatality ratio.

## Learning Objectives

- Calculate case fatality ratio (CFR)
- Estimate infection fatality ratio (IFR)
- Adjust for time-to-death and censoring
- Compare severity across populations and time periods
